title.rendered: Dr. Pearlman Weighs-in on the TikTok Lip Flip Trend in Women’s Health Magazine

content.rendered:
Our Medical Director, Dr. Steven Pearlman, was interviewed by Women’s Health Magazine to weigh-in on the latest TikTok procedure trend, the “Lip Flip”.

Read Full Article

Lip Treatment Options At Pearlman Aesthetic surgery

We are excited to offer our patients a variety of procedures, both surgical and non-surgical, to address the different lip concerns.

  • Lip Filler
  • Lip Filler Correction
  • The “Lip Flip”
  • Lip Lift and Corner Lip Lift 

VISIT OUR RENOWNED NEW YORK CITY PRACTICE TO LEARN MORE ABOUT LIP FILLER NEAR YOU AT PEARLMAN AESTHETIC SURGERY

Pearlman Aesthetic Surgery is a Manhattan plastic surgery clinic on Park Avenue. At Pearlman Aesthetic Surgery, we help our patients to actualize the best possible version of themselves, restoring a sense of self-confidence and comfort in their own skin. Through innovative, cutting-edge technology coupled with an intuitive understanding of how to accomplish each patient’s unique objectives, Dr. Pearlman and Dr. Stein consistently deliver exceptional cosmetic surgery results.

Our approach is always centered on our core values: outstanding care, innovation, compassion, transparency, and accountability. With years of experience serving patients from New York City, the United States, and world wide with our premier treatments and unmatched service, we love providing individualized care for the best results possible.

PROCEDURE MATCH TOOL
